review_title: Works well as general cold remedy
review_text: As a mother I was excited to see a PM version of our favorite herbal tea. We use the regular Cold Care blend as the first signs of cold symptoms. The quality of the ingredients are good, as evidenced by the taste of the tea, but we haven't noticed much in the way of assisting rest. All in all we will probably use the rest of what we have and then continue using regular Cold Care.
